meanings.definition: A salt or ester of linoleic acid.
meanings.sent1: The linoleate helped improve the texture of the lotion.
meanings.sent2: I bought a linoleate supplement for its health benefits.
meanings.sent3: The linoleate in the salad dressing made the vegetables taste better.
meanings.sent4: Her skin felt like a smooth linoleate canvas after applying the moisturizer.
meanings.sent5: The linoleate added a glossy sheen to the paint.

meanings.definition: To treat or coat with linoleate.
meanings.sent1: She linoleated the wooden floors to protect them from scratches.
meanings.sent2: The chef linoleates the pans before cooking to prevent sticking.
meanings.sent3: He linoleated his shoes with a special polish to make them waterproof.
meanings.sent4: The artist linoleated the canvas before painting to create a smooth surface.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic linoleated the car parts to prevent rust.
